Based on a total of 131 Covid-19 cases. The vaccine was 62% effective in the 8,895 participants who received two "full" doses. For the 2,741 participants who received a half dose followed by a full dose, the vaccine was 90% effective, AZ said. The combined analysis gave 70%.
